string.value: I've learned the Battleship Skill but I don't really know how to use it freely as of yet. I can't figure out what the problem is! I'd better ask Kyrin.

So I guess I still need to learn some more skills before I can use the Battleship Skill, plus I need to learn how to properly control and attack from the battleship while riding on it before I can learn how to use the skill itself... Let me go watch the Gigantic Spirit Vikings in Ludibrium, and to prove that I've completed my training, I must defeat #r150 Gigantic Spirit Vikings#k and bring back #b50 Vikings' Token#k for Kyrin.

I took the proof of my training to Kyrin and she taught me the Battleship Torpedo Skill in return.
고민이 있는 듯한 표정이군. 무슨 일이 있는거야? 흐음... 배틀쉽을 아직 사용하기 어렵다는 거지? 훗~ 걱정마. 아직 배틀쉽을 이용하여 강력한 공격법을 익히지 못해서 그래. 쉽고 빠른 훈련이 있는데 한번 받아보겠어?
좋아. 그럼 할 일을 가르쳐주지. 아직 배를 타고 어떻게 공격해야 하는지 당황스러울꺼야. 그러니까 우선 남이 배를 타고 어떤 방식으로 공격하는지 잘 살펴보는 게 어때? 그걸 잘 파악한다면 배틀쉽을 사용하는데 문제가 없겠지?
루디브리엄에 가면 #r기간틱 바이킹#k들이 있을거야. 그들을 잘 살펴보면서 #r150마리#k를 무찌르고 와. 그리고 무찔렀다는 증거로 #b바이킹의 증표 50개#k를 가지고 와 줘. 훌륭하게 훈련을 해다고 생각되면 배틀쉽을 이용한 새로운 스킬을 가르쳐주지.
아직 훈련의 필요성을 못 느끼나보군. 새로운 스킬이 배우고 싶다면 언제든지 찾아와

You seem concerned about something. What is it? Hmmm... are you worried that you have not mastered the handling of Battleship yet? Haha, don't worry about it. You just haven't learned the powerful skills that go with the Battleship yet. There's a quick and easy training session for this. Are you interested?

Okay, here's your mission. You are probably still not very good at navigating around with the Battleship. You'll need to have great control over it in order to use other skills. What I'm suggesting here is... how about observing how others sail with ships, or how to fight while on it? If you really watch for it, you'll figure it out, and you'll be better with the Battleship, right?

Go to Ludibrium and you'll encounter a bunch of #rGigantic Spirit Vikings#k. Observe them carefully, and when you feel like you've picked them apart, defeat #r150#k of them. I also need to see an evidence from you that you really did slay them all, so I want you bring #b50 Spirit Viking Tokens#k with you. If I see that you have really trained yourself in this session, then I'll teach you a new skill.
I don't think you understand the importance of training, yet. If you want to learn a new skill, come see me.

That was a great training session! What was it like facing the Gigantic Spirit Vikings? Weren't they great navigating around the ship while attacking at the same time? I guarantee that if you train yourself a bit harder, then you'll end up much more powerful than them. As a reward for safely completing the task, I'll teach you how to use "Battleship Torpedo".
Battleship Torpedo is a powerful, powerful skill that can only be used when you are on the Battleship. Please use this skill wisely...
You need to bring in 50 Spirit Viking Tokens. That's what I'd call training.
You need to defeat 150 Gigantic Spirit Vikings. That's what I'd call training.
